name: Wordsworks Copywriting Ltd
description:
Wordsworks is a professional copywriting agency. Words are all we do. 
Our in-house team of experienced copywriters combines in-depth copywriting expertise, top notch journalism skills and bags of creativity. 
It includes former journalists from the national and trade press, alongside conceptual copywriters with experience at some of the UK’s largest creative agencies. 
And if deadlines or subject matter requires it, we’ve got a small hand-picked pool of associate writers to call on, too.
It is a flexible, scalable approach that gives us the versatility to handle the tightest deadlines, deliver all sizes of project and write about virtually any topic, from fork lift trucks to wind turbines, financial services to education.
So next time you’re looking for copywriting support that is flexible enough to handle your changing needs, and reliable enough to deliver the goods, no matter what the deadline or the topic, why not give us a try?
